mapper.select: SELECT U.NAME AS "name", B.BOOK_TITLE AS "bookTitle" , A.APPROVAL_NO AS "approvalNo", A.APPROVAL_STATUS AS "approvalStatus", A.APPROVED_BY AS "approvedBy", TO_CHAR(A.APPROVED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "approvedDate", A.LOAN_NO AS "loanNo", A.USER_NO AS "userNo" FROM BOOK_LOAN_APPROVAL A JOIN USERS U ON A.USER_NO=U.USER_NO JOIN BOOK_LOANS L ON A.LOAN_NO=L.LOAN_NO JOIN REAL_BOOKS R ON L.REAL_BOOK=R.REAL_BOOK JOIN BOOKS B ON R.BOOK_NO=B.BOOK_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_LOANS B SET B.DUE_DATE = B.DUE_DATE+7 WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM USERS U JOIN BOOK_LOAN_APPROVAL A ON B.LOAN_NO=A.LOAN_NO WHERE B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND A.approval_no =#{approvalNO} AND approval_status ='대기' AND U.STATUS = '정상' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM BOOK_LOAN_APPROVAL X WHERE X.LOAN_NO = A.LOAN_NO AND X.APPROVAL_STATUS = '승인' ) )
